website_summaries.verdict: The Jabra Sport Coach earphones deliver strong Bluetooth audio and some added fitness app functionality.
pros: Powerful audio performance with rich bass and clear highs
Built-in motion sensors measure distance, pace, steps, cadence, and calories burned
Works with free Jabra Sport Life app
Sport Button automatically launches app on connected device
cons: Audio could have a touch more high-mid presence
Not for those seeking intensely booming bass during their workouts

customer_reviews.title: 3 pairs in 3 months, all faulty!!!
customer_reviews.text: My first pair worked flawlessly for 3 months but for some reason just stopped working one day - the buttons on the remote became unresponsive so I wasn't able to turn them on. I ordered another pair hoping for better luck but they had a problem with the battery and only lasted between 10 to 20 mins before dying despite being fully charging and showing the battery to be full. Thinking '3rd time lucky...' I ordered another pair but they seem to have the same problem as the first pair and won't even turn on! There is clearly some kind on manufacturing defect with these or poor quality control by the company so won't be purchasing from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed to say the Least
customer_reviews.text: Original sent wouldn't connect to any device and would show it was fully charged but wouldn't show the blue light to connect even after following instructions. Got a replacement and the same happened even trying with multiple devices to pair. Now can't return even though still faulty and having to seek out manufacturers support with no reply
customer_reviews.author: R-Kid

customer_reviews.title: I now feel stuck with earphones I don't like without recourse to change them or get my money ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I found these to be enormously disappointing. The battery lasts about an hour and when I reported this as a fault to the seller I was referred to the manufacturer. I now feel stuck with earphones I don't like without recourse to change them or get my money back. I have to charge them twice a day! Unreasonable. They do fit quite well and the sound is good. Useless if they cant last long enough for my morning commute.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Fordred

customer_reviews.title: Really bad battery life
customer_reviews.text: It's a very confortable and cool looking set but the battery life is the worst I've haver seen, it went from lasting 2h to only about 30minutes with max volume. it's not worth all this money for sure, it's probably in the 20-25 dollar range.
customer_reviews.author: Guilherme Manaças

customer_reviews.title: Great earphones, with motion sensor and high quality built
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these earphones, they come packed with extras and a lot of different fitting to ensure a perfect fit. Install the app, fine tune the earphones and u r good to go
customer_reviews.author: Luca Avalle

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for the money
customer_reviews.text: Cant faults these headphones, great price and decent enough sound . I use them for long distance running and never have issues with them falling out etc battery life is approx 5hrs. Only thing id say to improve is a song skip button for iphone would be great!
customer_reviews.author: Malraff

customer_reviews.title: Goog but only lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: Great headsets, but only designed in my opinion to last about a year of average use. After one year of use the volume went on left ear with no quick fix. Looking at some forms this is a common problem.
customer_reviews.author: clem clements

customer_reviews.title: POOR CRAFTMANSHIP
customer_reviews.text: Product is reasonably ok, only problem, it’s craftmanship is very very poor, as you can see illustrated in the photo attached that the ear piece just literally came apart, jabra claim mositure safe, which you can get by in the first year or so, this item will fall apart be aware!
customer_reviews.author: JATT STARBOY

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones for the price tag; battery life could be better. Great option for running but not the most comfortable one.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted around twenty indivual users over the course of 6 months then sound ceased coming out of the right ear bud, not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: R S.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a year
customer_reviews.text: One of the ear pieces stopped working exactly a year later with normal use.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Battery failed
customer_reviews.text: This product has stopped charging after only 4 months of use. Is there a warranty with them so I can get a replacement as that is rubbish (and clearly happening to quite a few others going by the reviews)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely rubbish. Completely died after a few months. ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely rubbish. Completely died after a few months. Battery would only last about an hour on a full charge. Stay away. Run.
customer_reviews.author: Donal Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product fits in ear very comfortably but controls are a bit fiddly
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: All good besides battery life
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sound, versatility, design and all. Just the battery... can't stand charging it every 3-4hrs of play.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Remote control dead after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Whilst product itself is ok, quality is poor. Remote control stopped working after just over two months
customer_reviews.author: Olof Darpö

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: please please don't buy they are the worst product you could ever purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Cemlyn J.

customer_reviews.title: I bought a pair as I liked the idea of having a good set of headphones ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair as I liked the idea of having a good set of headphones with a decent balance between audio performance, comfort and the coaching aspect. I got them and used them twice per week for about two to three months and was very satisfied with the aspects I wanted. Unfortunately, they started to lose charge quickly after about 6 weeks and then stopped charging at all. Amazon, as usual, have provided excellent customer service and I will get a refund but I now need to find another pair. I may give these one more chance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but expect them to break within a few months
customer_reviews.text: These has good sound quality and decent battery life. However, in the two years I've had them for, they broke (buttons become unresponsive, thus you can't turn them on) mutliple times but I was able to get replacements through the warranty. Now, they're broken again and the warranty has ran out, so they're completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Potiriadis

customer_reviews.title: Broken sound after  2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I was given as present but after 2 weeks of usage the quality of sound gone too a very poor quality
customer_reviews.author: MATJOSE

product_meta.title: Jabra 100-97500001-60 Sport Coach Wireless Bluetooth Stereo Headphones for Cross Training - Blue/Grey
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Blue/Grey| Style Name:EU VersionJabra Sport Coach Wireless Bluetooth Stereo Headphones for Cross Training - Blue/Grey.

BOX CONTAINS
Headphones
feature_bullets: A wireless workout solution and fitness tracker
Optimised for cross training and other indoor and interval based training and fitness regimes
TrackFit: Enhanced motion sensor for fitness tracking
